name: Romania
startIntroPart1: Mighty Michael the Brave, unifier of Wallachia, Transylvania, and Moldavia, your name thunders across the Carpathians and Danube as a symbol of courage and unity. In a time of shifting alliances and empires pressing from all sides, you dared to forge a Romanian realm from fractured lands — if only for a fleeting moment. The Ottomans, the Habsburgs, and the Polish crown all sought to claim your people, but your sword carved a path through history, inspiring generations to come.
startIntroPart2: In this era of conquest and diplomacy, you must navigate the complexities of a fractured Europe. Your strategic prowess and military acumen will be tested as you defend your borders and expand your influence. The Carpathian Mountains stand as your natural fortress, and the fertile plains of the Danube will nourish your growing empire. Unite your people, forge alliances, and build a legacy that will echo through the centuries. The fate of Romania rests in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge and create an empire that stands the test of time?
